article.title: Enhanced Discrete Events System framework (graph based). Requirements.

abstract.simpara: This document collects use-cases and software requirements for Discrete Events System framework ver 2.

sect2.title: UC_GRAPH_01 Getting parent nodes available.
sect2.sect3:
Description CLIENT requests adding new graph node into the graph - SYSTEM offers the following ways to do this:
From the current graphs loaded in environment by specifyinc local URI From external graph by specifying full URI (URI includes graph spec and node within the spec) From graph provider

sect2.title: UC_GRAPH_02 Creation from spec
sect2.sect3: Description CLIENT requests creation of graph by spec - SYSTEM creates the graph using the spec given.

sect2.title: UC_GRAPH_02.1 Spec of creation
sect2.sect3:
Description [Ext UC_GRAPH_02] Graph spec consists of:
Name Parent Mutations
The mutation can be as:
Adding node or edge Changing of node or edge attributes Mutating of graph element if it's representing graph itself.

sect2.sect3: Description CLIENT requests serialization - SYSTEM serialize the graph as graph spec.
